title.narrative: STRENGTHENED DATA SYSTEMS

description.narrative: Strengthened national capacity to collect, analyze and use data and evidence on the situation of children, with focus on disparities and vulnerabilities., which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Reducing Child Poverty, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Child poverty in all its forms is reduced through quality, evidence-based policies, programmes and budgets for all children, especially the most marginalized, at national and subnational levels

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened national capacity to collect, analyze and use data and evidence on the situation of children, with focus ondisparities and vulnerabilities.

description.narrative: Notwithstanding the global COVID-19 pandemic, in close collaboration with the Statistics Offices on Mainland and in Zanzibar, UNICEF supported the production of high quality, highly disaggregated, data and evidence;on the situation of;children and adolescents in Tanzania by providing technical support to the development of DHS 2020/2021. The ongoing study on Multi-dimensional Child Poverty is a significant step towards the institutionalization of multidimensional child poverty measures in national household surveys.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:22/12/2021

title.narrative: Existence of disaggregated national household survey data on child-focused targets of SDGs collected within the preceding 5 years(66229)

baseline.value: Disaggregated national household survey data collected within the preceding 5 years exists on some child-focused targets of SDGs.

target.value: 2021:Disaggregated national household survey data collected within the preceding 5 years exists on all key child-focused targets of SDGs.

actual.value: 2021:Financial and technical support to TDHS 2021/22. Pre-test carried out and data collection planned early 2022.

title.narrative: National government measurement of child poverty using multidimensional measures (25-01-L3-01), Text

baseline.value: One child poverty analysis completed employing both monetary and multidimensional measures of poverty. Child poverty measurement not institutionalized within government.

target.value: 2021:Child poverty analysis employing both monetary and multidimensional measures of poverty institutionalized, routinely conducted and regularly used to report progress.

actual.value: 2021:Two ongoing studies in Zanzibar and Mainland on CMP with the aim of institutionalize / integrate a CMP measure into national statistics.
